items.text: fuller on middle, pushed uppishly back towards the bowler, a low chance to his right, gets his hand down but it doesn't stick
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, Williams runs it down towards third man
items.postText:
Asif: "Saifuddin is performing much better than before. He looks like a reformed player. If he can keep the performance up then he will be a very impactful player in the worldcup."

By the way, here's Debayan's response when I told him about Comilla/Kumilla thing: "If it's any consolation, I pronounce all Bangladeshi names in proper Bangla and not their Anglicised versions."
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, 1 run

items.preText: Mashrafe to continue, no signs of spin yet.
items.text: short of length outside off from around the wicket, punched towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.preText: Tosnimul Hassan: "I hope ZIM will win today. I am very unhappy with inconsistent team selection of Bangladesh. Keeping players in bench they can not call random players from outside. Shanto should have been selected if Mahmud do not deserve another game. "
items.text: length ball, on the pads, a short-arm flick towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: short of length outside off, driven on the up but straight to the extra cover fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, defended back towards the bowler, who has just overstepped here. Free hit coming up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 no ball

items.text: ends up bowling it in the slot, over-pitched around off stump, Taylor clears his front leg and lofts it over wide long for a six
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, comes forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Grapes: "Are the there no comments from Zim fans today? I hope Zim wins just to silence the critics." -- Hardly anything.
items.text: length ball, just outside off, looked like an offcutter, Taylor comes forward and defends it on the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, but wide outside off, Williams slashes at it, doesn't middle it as the ball goes uppishly towards third man
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, 1 run

items.text: shot of the day so far! It was fuller around middle and leg, Taylor just nonchalantly flicks it over midwicket and it sails over the fence for six
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Taylor, SIX runs

items.text: works it towards square leg for two more
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: fuller around middle and leg, pushes it towards long-on
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, angling across the left-hander, Williams was caught at the crease, ends up pushing at it and gets beaten, almost gets squared up
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, no run

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, no run

items.text: length outside off, punched off the back foot towards deep extra cover for a couple
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 2 runs

items.preText: Hassan: "How sound these two palyers are! Of they had two more consistent players, BAN could not get away so easily. I love to watch Taylor and Sean playing together. "
items.text: length ball, just around off, dabs it on the leg side and looks to steal a single, the short midwicket fielder comes charging in to prevent the run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: and that's 50 for Taylor, it was full outside off, he drops it towards point and sprints across. A sublime knock so far, he would like to convert this into a big one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, pitching around leg, Williams looks to go for the pull but misses and gets rapped near the knee roll, a loud appeal but it pitched way outside the leg stump
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: length ball, on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.preText: Ameen Chilwan: "@Grapes: We the Zim fans, sitting in Tanzania, do not want to take any chance on jinx/luck/witchcraft or anything similar. Just want to keep quiet and wait for a long awaited win. (and that is a perfect jinx thing to say)"
items.text: and ends the over with a boundary. It was a touch fuller, just outside off, Taylor came forward and lofted it past the bowler for another four
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.preText: Thanks, Hemant. Zimbabwe's two old workhorses with a recovery here.
items.text: gets forward to push a fuller one to the left of the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: looped up on leg stumps, gets down and unfurls a reverse sweep through the acres of vacant space in the covers
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, FOUR runs

items.text: leg-side length ball, tucked off the pads to short fine
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, no run

items.text: similar line and length, tucked in front of square to deep midwicket this time
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, 1 run
